Woohoo, I got a few mins online! The keyboard I'm at sucks, so if
there are any typos in this post, sorry.

::Base::

The autoguns targeted Unitron, continuing to fire at him, and also at
the heads of the robots he was behind. The gas seeped into all the
robots, beginning its deadly procedure. The wall that had been under
fire gave in, a hallway beyond, with concentrated gas filling it.
There were blast doors closed about 10 feet either way in the hallway,
barring any passing. The concentrated gas rushed into the room,
enveloping the robots inside and beginning its procedure as well.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Unitron/Sixshot/Ares/Firestarter/Double
Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Unitron ducked under the autogun fire, his tendrils disconnecting
from the 
> two robots, and he moved on behind Double Punch and his minions. 
The 
> tendrils bored into the back of Double Punch and Manterror's heads,
Unitron's 
> hands going up on the back of Injector and Bumblebee's, a
transmission being 
> sent out towards Rapa Nui.
> 
> ---
> 
> Autogun fire did almost no damage to Sixshot as he fired another
missile from 
> his launcher at the weakened wall.
> 
> ---
> 
> Ares ducked under the fire, shooting three bolts of laser fire at
three 
> different autoguns.
> 
> ---
> 
> Double Punch fired another two missiles at the damaged wall.
> 
> ---
> 
> Manterror fired up at the cieling with two ion disks.
> 
> ---
> 
> Injector fired off two stinger missiles at the same corner.
> 
> ---
> 
> Bumblebee coughed and nearly fell over as his weaker design was
getting 
> damaged by the gas, two optic blasts errupting from his eyes at the
ceiling.
